mods.abstract: The recto depicts "Red River Dave" sitting and playing a guitar. Recto reads: "Red River Dave" McEnery. Entertainer, radio star and successful composer of more than 100 cowboy melodies. Well known to millions of listeners over WEAF, WOR, WMCA, etc. Plays a Gretsch "Synchromatic" Guitar and won't se anything but La Tosca Strings. Watch for him in your daily radio program and hear cowboy music at its best. Verso reads: Available now! First Post-War Model. Gretch 'Synchromatic' Guitar. Prompt shipment is assured on your orders for this beautiful new professional guitar! Built in the favored super-auditorium size; full arched body construction; steel reinforced neck; individual machines; superb tone and fin playing action. No. Px 5674-Gretsch "Synchromatic" Guitar complete with De Armond Electric Pick-Up and deluxe veneer shell, plush lined case. Each---$ 151.50. (Without puck-up, $124.00) Regular Dealer Discount Applies The Red. Gretsch MFG. Co. Musical Instrument Makes Since 1883.

titleInfo.title: RG 182 Danny Allen Country Music Postcard collection

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Tennessee Technological University. Archives and Special Collections
